desc: An event that was booked to a room. This can either be a class, exam, seminar, etc. While these values are harvested from an official source, note that events may be canceled or postponed, so do not assume a reliability of 100%.
News from the UniPi Informatica website.
A phone number of a teacher! :) :) Yes, a teacher! Finally you can call Ferragina when you have any problems with Algorithm Engineering!
A room directly from the official rooms list. This information should be official
An UniPi course. Courses are associated with a teacher, a code, a semester, etc. These should be considered as official.
A teacher from UniPi. This information should be official as it comes directly from margot.
